name: avg
description: Returns the average of values in a group.

name: count
description: Returns the number of items in a group.

name: count_big
description: Returns the number of items in a group as bigint.

name: grouping
description: Returns a bit indicating if row is aggregated or not.

name: max
description: Returns the maximum value in a group.

name: min
description: Returns the minimum value in a group.

name: sum
description: Returns the sum of all values in a group.

name: stdev
description: Returns the statistical standard deviation of values.

name: var
description: Returns the statistical variance of values.

name: atn2
description: Returns angle in radians between x-axis and line.

name: ceiling
description: Returns smallest integer greater than number.

name: floor
description: Returns largest integer less than number.

name: power
description: Returns value raised to specified power.

name: ascii
description: Returns ASCII code of leftmost character.

name: char
description: Returns character with specified ASCII code.

name: iif
description: Returns value based on Boolean expression.

name: getutcdate
description: Returns current UTC date and time.

name: isdate
description: Checks if value is valid date.

name: sysdatetime
description: Returns date and time of SQL Server.

name: percentile_cont
description: Returns percentile based on continuous distribution.

name: percentile_disc
description: Returns percentile based on discrete distribution.
